name: MobileGo
description: MobileGo (MGO), a cryptocurrency that offers in-game rewards. Its ultimate goal is to 'make games available to everyone'. With the beta release of its eSports platform, the MGO token is used as a match reward and entrance fee for tournaments. It also enables holders to earn discounts for in-game purchases. Users can earn Gshare Gold, which enables participation in Gshare Gold fee-based tournaments. It supports HTML5 games on PC and mobile.
